pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast, Universal, and Intuitive Computing on Large-Scale Single- Cell Data // Single-cell datasets are growing in size, posing challenges as well as opportunities for biology researchers. 'ondisc' (short for "on-disk single cell") enables users to easily and efficiently analyze large-scale single-cell data. 'ondisc' makes computing on large-scale single-cell data FUN: Fast, Universal, and iNtuitive.
